-	script	MVPcash	-1,{
OnInit:
.listmonster$ = "1038|1039|1046|1059|1086|1087|1112|1115|1147|1150|1157|1159|1190|1251|1252|1272|1312|1373|1389|1399|1418|1492|1502|1511|1583|1623|1630|1646|1647|1648|1649|1650|1651|1658|1685|1688|1708|1719|1734|1751|1768|1779|1785|1832|1871|1874|1876|1885|1917|1980|2022|2052|2068|2087|2094|2095|2096|2097|2098|2099|2100|2101|2103|2104|2105|2106|2107|2108|2109|2110|2111|2112|2113|2131|2156|2165|2202|2235|2236|2237|2238|2239|2240|2241|2249|2251|2253|2255|2319|2341|2362|2441|2442|2443|2444|2445|2446|2447|2448|2449|2483|2529|2532|2533|2534|2535|2996|3074|3426|3427|3428|3429|3430|3450|3473|3621|3628|3633|3658|3659|3757|3758|20381";
end;
OnNPCKillEvent:
	if( compare( "|"+.listmonster$+"|","|"+killedrid+"|" ) ){
		if(rand(100)>0){
			set #CASHPOINTS,#CASHPOINTS + 100;
			dispbottom "Gained 500 Cash Point. Total = "+#CASHPOINTS+" Cash Points.";
			end;
		}
		end;
	}
}
-	script	Champcash	-1,{
OnInit:
.listmonster$ = "2603|2604|2605|2606|2607|2608|2609|2610|2611|2612|2613|2614|2615|2616|2617|2618|2619|2620|2621|2622|2623|2624|2625|2626|2627|2628|2629|2630|2631|2632|2633|2634|2635|2636|2637|2638|2639|2640|2641|2642|2643|2644|2645|2646|2647|2648|2649|2650|2651|2652|2653|2654|2655|2656|2657|2658|2659|2660|2661|2662|2663|2664|2665|2666|2667|2668|2669|2670|2671|2672|2673|2674|2675|2676|2677|2678|2679|2680|2681|2682|2683|2684|2685|2686|2687|2688|2689|2690|2691|2692|2693|2694|2695|2696|2697|2698|2699|2700|2701|2702|2703|2704|2705|2706|2707|2708|2709|2710|2711|2712|2713|2714|2715|2716|2717|2718|2719|2720|2721|2722|2723|2724|2725|2726|2727|2728|2729|2730|2731|2732|2733|2734|2735|2736|2737|2738|2739|2740|2741|2742|2743|2744|2745|2746|2747|2748|2749|2750|2751|2752|2753|2754|2755|2756|2757|2758|2759|2760|2761|2762|2763|2764|2765|2766|2767|2768|2769|2770|2771|2772|2773|2774|2775|2776|2777|2778|2779|2780|2781|2782|2783|2784|2785|2786|2787|2788|2789|2790|2791|2792|2793|2794|2795|2796|2797|2798|2799|2800|2801|2802|2803|2804|2805|2806|2807|2808|2809|2810|2811|2812|2813|2814|2815|2816|2817|2818|2819|2820|2821|2822|2823|2824|2825|2826|2827|2828|2829|2830|2831|2832|2833|2834|2835|2836|2837|2838|2839|2840|2841|2842|2843|2844|2845|2846|2847|2848|2849|2850|2851|2852|2853|2854|2855|2856|2857|2858|2859|2860|2861|2862|2863|2864|2865|2866|2867|2868|2869|2870|2871|2872|2873|2874|2875|2876|2877|2878|2879|2880|2881|2882|2883|2884|2885|2886|2887|2888|2889|2890|2891|2892|2893|2894|2895|2896|2897|2898|2899|2900|2901|2902|2903|2904|2905|2906|2907|2908|2909|2910|2911|2912|2913|3175|3176|3177|3178|3179|3180|3181";
end;
OnNPCKillEvent:
	if( compare( "|"+.listmonster$+"|","|"+killedrid+"|" ) ){
		if(rand(100)>0){
			set #CASHPOINTS,#CASHPOINTS + 5;
			dispbottom "Gained 5 Cash Point. Total = "+#CASHPOINTS+" Cash Points.";
			end;
		}
		end;
	}
}
-	script	Bosscash	-1,{
OnInit:
.listmonster$ = "1089|1090|1091|1092|1093|1096|1120|1136|1137|1203|1204|1205|1247|1259|1262|1283|1288|1289|1295|1302|1307|1320|1388|1395|1396|1397|1398|1447|1449|1456|1485|1486|1487|1518|1529|1530|1542|1568|1576|1582|1591|1592|1593|1605|1609|1610|1611|1612|1626|1640|1641|1642|1643|1644|1645|1674|1681|1689|1690|1700|1701|1702|1703|1704|1705|1706|1707|1709|1710|1711|1712|1720|1731|1733|1754|1755|1756|1763|1764|1765|1766|1767|1783|1791|1795|1799|1800|1801|1802|1803|1804|1805|1806|1807|1808|1809|1810|1813|1814|1815|1816|1817|1828|1829|1830|1831|1833|1834|1835|1839|1840|1841|1842|1843|1844|1846|1847|1848|1849|1850|1852|1853|1870|1872|1873|1877|1879|1887|1888|1889|1890|1891|1897|1899|1900|1902|1903|1904|1905|1907|1908|1916|1918|1919|1920|1921|1922|1923|1924|1925|1929|1930|1931|1932|1933|1934|1935|1936|1947|1949|1950|1951|1952|1953|1954|1955|1956|1957|1958|1959|1960|1961|1962|1966|1967|1990|1991|2000|2001|2008|2009|2025|2039|2040|2041|2075|2079|2080|2102|2138|2139|2140|2141|2142|2143|2146|2150|2161|2162|2163|2164|2170|2171|2172|2173|2174|2175|2176|2177|2178|2179|2180|2181|2182|2183|2184|2185|2186|2187|2188|2189|2190|2191|2192|2193|2194|2196|2198|2206|2208|2212|2215|2216|2228|2229|2230|2231|2232|2233|2234|2250|2252|2254|2256|2277|2278|2279|2280|2288|2306|2308|2317|2318|2320|2321|2322|2323|2327|2332|2333|2335|2352|2375|2376|2408|2409|2410|2411|2413|2470|2471|2472|2473|2474|2475|2476|2485|2530|2531|2536|2537|2539|2562|2563|2564|2650|2665|2675|2684|2685|2686|2721|2726|2736|2742|2743|2744|2788|2828|2921|2922|2923|2930|2933|2934|2942|2988|2997|2998|2999|3000|3001|3002|3003|3004|3005|3006|3007|3008|3029|3038|3039|3040|3041|3073|3089|3090|3091|3092|3096|3097|3098|3099|3105|3106|3108|3109|3124|3181|3190|3191|3192|3193|3194|3195|3196|3202|3203|3208|3209|3210|3211|3212|3213|3214|3215|3216|3217|3218|3219|3220|3221|3222|3223|3224|3225|3226|3227|3228|3229|3230|3231|3232|3233|3234|3235|3236|3237|3238|3239|3240|3241|3242|3243|3244|3245|3246|3254|3474|3475|3478|3484|3505|3514|3516|3522|3524|3526|3630|3741|3756|3810|3811|3812|20340|20346|20347|20351|20353|21064|21065|21066|21067|21068|21069|21070|21071|21072|21073|21074|21075|21076|21078|21079|21080|21081|21082|21083|21084|21085|21086";
end;
OnNPCKillEvent:
	if( compare( "|"+.listmonster$+"|","|"+killedrid+"|" ) ){
		if(rand(100)>0){
			set #CASHPOINTS,#CASHPOINTS + 10;
			dispbottom "Gained 20 Cash Point. Total = "+#CASHPOINTS+" Cash Points.";
			end;
		}
		end;
	}
}
